div.p: Hi, and welcome to our Building Queensland website.
This web site is a great way for you to find out what our record job-creating building program is delivering in your local community.
Whether you are in Cape York, Cloncurry, or Currumbin, there's building happening right now, right across Queensland.
We're building new hospitals and upgrading existing ones. We're building new roads, new police stations and better schools.
We're working on projects that embrace Queensland's wonderful environment and lifestyle, with new children's playgrounds, and walking tracks and swimming pools.
My Government is investing a record $18.2 billion on projects like these, in communities like yours â€“ and more.
It's more than any other State or Territory in Australia. It's securing 127,000 local jobs right across Queensland.
Such a massive investment in building in these very difficult economic times was a big decision for the Government.
But it's a decision I made my number one priority.
Why? Because it's creating jobs for Queenslanders, and it's building now what we need for tomorrow.
Behind every job is a working family.
There is a lot to love about Queensland. That's why 2,000 more people every week are calling Queensland home.
Our building program is building better schools, better hospitals, more roads, better public transport in communities just like yours.
It's about jobs for now. But it's also about training opportunities so that we can build and hang on to the skills that we will need in better times.
It's all about investing in jobs today and about building a stronger, better Queensland for the future.
